0.title: Chernobyl's Deadly Secrets
0.plot: Go inside the abandoned city of Chernobyl to follow an investigation into the truth behind the nuclear meltdown there over 30 years ago. New evidence reveals that this accident may be one of the greatest sabotages in history.

1.title: Doomsday at Dragon's Teeth
1.plot: Eerie ghost ships stranded in an alien desert, sinister ruins known as the Dragon's Teeth, and a ghostly complex with a bloody past are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

2.title: Nightmare on Blood Mountain
2.plot: A ghost ship thousands of miles away from where anyone expected, a bridge to nowhere in Florida's Hurricane Alley, and a haunting mountain complex with a bloody secret are deserted engineering projects; new discoveries reveal why they were abandoned.

3.title: Tower of Death
3.plot: An alien Nazi structure that changed history, a strange Soviet monolith known as the Tower of Death, and a concrete ocean giant are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

4.title: Underwater Ghost Prison
4.plot: An entrance to the underworld in the American wild, a haunting Soviet underwater prison, and a strange complex of towers in a forest of ice are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

5.title: America's Doomsday Town
5.plot: A strange deserted city in America's heartland, an eerie gigantic wall deep in snow-capped mountains, and a mysterious top-secret Soviet facility are deserted engineering projects. New discoveries reveal how they were built & why they were abandoned.

6.title: City of the Damned
6.plot: A deserted town in Spain with a bloody past and a ghost fleet heading nowhere are homes to dark American secrets, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

7.title: The Town That Disappeared
7.plot: A haunted lighthouse on Lake Michigan, a town where everyone seems to have vanished all at once, and a secret complex of tunnels beneath London are deserted engineering projects.

8.title: Twisted Relics
8.plot: This episode is a mashup of S03E06, "City of the Damned" and S03E04, "Underwater Ghost Prison".

9.title: Nazi Death Star
9.plot: A Nazi fortress that could have changed history if it was finished, an underwater graveyard of unexpected American treasures, and a network of tunnels hiding a secret history of New York were abandoned for mysterious reasons.

1.title: Nazi Ghost Town
1.plot: Some of the world's most incredible engineering projects are now deserted. Revisit a Soviet megastructure, a massive Nazi brainwashing complex, and a dangerous desert pass to find out how they were built and why they were mysteriously abandoned.

2.title: Curse of Hell Island
2.plot: Some of the world's most incredible engineering projects are now deserted. Explore a ghost town that was once a dangerous industrial hellscape, a giant warship at the bottom of the ocean, and a top secret relic that could have changed the Cold War.

3.title: Phantoms of Chernobyl
3.plot: Exploring various historical sites, who built them and why they became abandoned...the Kinzua Viaduct from Pennsylvania to the Great Lakes region, built by the Phoenix Steel Company in 1882 and brought down 44 years after it becomes a tourist attraction by an F-1 tornado which topples over half the bridge in 2003; Chernobyl in Pripryat, Ukraine built in 1970 by the USSR a restricted, technologically advanced city that could house around 50,000 people, which fell to disaster on 26 April 1986 when reactor 4 melts down and the residents are only evacuated after 30 hours,...

4.title: Wild West Apocalypse
4.plot: Some of the world's most incredible engineering projects are now deserted. Explore what happened to a massive military site that was once a hotbed for nuclear testing, a top secret airbase hidden inside a mountain, and an otherworldly power plant.

5.title: Soviet Doomsday Device
5.plot: Some of the world's most incredible engineering projects are now deserted. Explore what happened to a classified Soviet machine built to prevent all-out nuclear war, a top secret Nazi facility, and a strange tower that left an enduring legacy.

6.title: The Tesla Conspiracy
6.plot: Some of the world's most incredible engineering projects are now deserted. Explore what happened to a cutting-edge research complex built by a visionary genius, an ambitious Nazi project that met a sinister end, and a Cold War relic that changed history.

7.title: The Devil's Road

1.title: Armageddon Highway
1.plot: A strange Cuban prison, an eerie escape route built for Armageddon, and an underwater marvel that changed history are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

2.title: Curse of the Haunted Prison
2.plot: A mysterious American pyramid built out of Cold War paranoia, a haunted prison, and a strange cluster of structures in the Atlantic are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

3.title: Arctic Hell Pit
3.plot: Traces of a Russian hole to hell in the Arctic, a military base in America's wild west, and a strange looming tower are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries real how they were built and why they were abandoned.

4.title: Desert Ghost Fort
4.plot: A secret Russian military base in the Gobi Desert, a strange complex in an American wasteland, and a relic high atop a mountain are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

5.title: Conspiracy on Devil's Mountain
5.plot: A secret structure on a sinister mountain, an industrial compound swallowed by a forest, and a mysterious run in a sand dune are strange deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

6.title: Secrets of the Alien Shrine
6.plot: A strange alien shrine on a mountain peak, a bridge built in the Alaskan wilderness, and an American castle with a dangerous secret are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

7.title: Amazon Ghost Town
7.plot: An American ghost town in the Amazon jungle, a secret Nazi base, and a deadly concrete fortress 866 miles long are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

8.title: Sea Fortress of Doom
8.plot: A terrifying sea fortress, a highway in the Amazon that suddenly vanishes, and a mysterious structure in the shadow of the Statue of Liberty are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

imdb.plot outline: Scattered around the world are long-forgotten engineering marvels, decaying cities and empty factories that once stood on the cutting edge of design and construction. Today they are discarded, dangerous, and some of them are even deadly. "Mysteries of the Abandoned" reveals why these engineering triumphs were built and how they were left to crumble. In each hour long episode, stories tell of who originally designed the structure, its historical significance, and why it was ultimately no longer viable. California's Goat Canyon Trestle railway, Pennsylvania's Kinzua Viaduct steel bridge, the Grand Goulets Road in the French Alps, and Hashima Island, a once thriving and now deserted Japanese island, are among episode subjects.
